twitter_posts.title:
Live now → https://www.makecomics.io/

Launched 24 hours ago and already have 1k signups and over 900 comics made!
twitter_posts.description:
Live now → makecomics.io/

Launched 24 hours ago and already have 1k signups and over 900 comics made!



Hassan (@nutlope)

Built an app that can generate an entire comic in a few seconds.

You can upload your own characters, choose a theme, & build your own comic page by page!
twitter_posts.author: Hassan El Mghari

twitter_posts.title:
R to @AnthropicAI: A central lesson of this work is that autonomy is co-constructed by the model, user, and product. It can't be fully characterized by pre-deployment evaluations alone.

For full deta
twitter_posts.description:
A central lesson of this work is that autonomy is co-constructed by the model, user, and product. It can't be fully characterized by pre-deployment evaluations alone.

For full details, and our recommendations to developers and policymakers, see the blog: anthropic.com/research/m
twitter_posts.author: Anthropic

twitter_posts.title:
R to @AnthropicAI: Software engineering makes up ~50% of agentic tool calls on our API, but we see emerging use in other industries. 

As the frontier of risk and autonomy expands, post-deployment mon
twitter_posts.description:
Software engineering makes up ~50% of agentic tool calls on our API, but we see emerging use in other industries. 

As the frontier of risk and autonomy expands, post-deployment monitoring becomes essential. We encourage other model developers to extend this research.
twitter_posts.author: Anthropic

twitter_posts.title:
R to @AnthropicAI: Most agent actions on our API are low risk. 73% of tool calls appear to have a human in the loop, and only 0.8% are irreversible.

But at the frontier, we see agents acting on secur
twitter_posts.description:
Most agent actions on our API are low risk. 73% of tool calls appear to have a human in the loop, and only 0.8% are irreversible.

But at the frontier, we see agents acting on security systems, financial transactions, and production deployments (though some may be evals).
twitter_posts.author: Anthropic

twitter_posts.title: i've been cynical on open source ai for the last 3 years, and it's not been a popular view. people want to hear that open source is catching up, that some underdog team found this One Weird Trick to o
twitter_posts.description:
i've been cynical on open source ai for the last 3 years, and it's not been a popular view. people want to hear that open source is catching up, that some underdog team found this One Weird Trick to outperform gpt5. Kimi K2.5 didnt even beat GPT 5.2 in the end.

@DeepSeek_ai v4 n
